BUG DESCRIPTION
===============

BUG: Wrong operation order

BUGGY LINE:
    refresh_efficiency = (time_until_expiry * 100 / expires_in) if expires_in > 0 else 0

FIXED LINE:
    refresh_efficiency = (time_until_expiry / expires_in * 100) if expires_in > 0 else 0

EXPLANATION:
Multiply by 100 before division
Result is used in return value

IMPACT: oauth token refresh produces incorrect results
PRIORITY: P2
